definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To adjust the size of; to make a certain size.
( transitive ) To classify or arrange by size.

subdefinitions.definition: ( military ) To take the height of men, in order to place them in the ranks according to their stature .
( mining ) To sift (pieces of ore or metal) in order to separate the finer from the coarser parts.

definitions.definition: ( transitive , colloquial ) To approximate the dimensions, estimate the size of.
( intransitive ) To take a greater size; to increase in size.
( UK , Cambridge University , obsolete ) To order food or drink from the buttery ; hence, to enter a score , as upon the buttery book.
( transitive , obsolete ) To swell; to increase the bulk of.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To adjust the size of; to make a certain size.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To classify or arrange by size.
( transitive , colloquial ) To approximate the dimensions, estimate the size of.
( intransitive ) To take a greater size; to increase in size.
( UK , Cambridge University , obsolete ) To order food or drink from the buttery ; hence, to enter a score , as upon the buttery book.
( transitive , obsolete ) To swell; to increase the bulk of.

definitions.definition: To apply glue or other primer to a surface which is to be painted.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To apply glue or other primer to a surface which is to be painted.
